CROSSBLADE.Settings.Enable.Name: Enable Crossblade
CROSSBLADE.Settings.Enable.Hint: Enable Crossblade sound layers (sounds are still loaded when disabledâ€”disable the module to disable all processing entirely)
CROSSBLADE.Settings.Combat.Pause.Name: Combat Pause
CROSSBLADE.Settings.Combat.Pause.Hint: Process Crossblade pause event in combat
CROSSBLADE.SimultaneousPlaybackReminder: Crossblade will only work on playlists that are configured for Simultaneous Playback mode.
CROSSBLADE.Events.Default.Label: Default
CROSSBLADE.Events.Default.Description: Triggers when no other events occur
CROSSBLADE.Events.Combat.Disposition.FRI: Triggers on Friendly combatants' turns in combat
CROSSBLADE.Events.Combat.Disposition.NEU: Triggers on Neutral combatants' turns in combat
CROSSBLADE.Events.Combat.Disposition.HOS: Triggers on Hostile combatants' turns in combat
CROSSBLADE.Events.Game.Paused.Label: Game Paused
CROSSBLADE.Events.Game.Paused.Descriptio: Triggers when game is paused; a Crossblade setting controls whether or not this event can be triggered in combat
